thread.section_title: The Lexington New York City, Autograph Collection - UPDATED 2017 Hotel Reviews & Price Comparison - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Great Location, Good Rooms
thread.title_full: Great Location, Good Rooms - Review of The Lexington New York City, Autograph Collection, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: ShakerFamily
title: Great Location, Good Rooms
text: For NY, this is a reasonable hotel with a great lobby and great location. The rooms are tight (but so are others in NY for the same price range), especially the bathrooms, and the mattresses and carpets seem a bit old. But all in all, not a bad place to sleep for a night.
